title: How to Unblock Someone on Grindr

steps.title: Open Grindr.
steps.content: Open Grindr. This app icon looks like a yellow/orange mask. You can find this app on your Home screen, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. This will take you to your profile.

steps.title: Tap the gear icon .
steps.content: Tap the gear icon . You'll see this in the top right of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Unblock Users.
steps.content: Tap Unblock Users . You'll find this under the header, "Security." All the users you've blocked will display here.

steps.title: Tap the user you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap the user you want to unblock. A window will pop up, asking if you want to unblock them.

steps.title: Tap OK.
steps.content: Tap OK . The user will disappear from the list and will be able to message you again. You must be using the premium version of the app to use this feature. [1] X Research source
